name: Don't Waste Your Time
description:
You are the apprentice of a famous wizard, but this one is gone in mysterious circonstances... 
Without loosing any time you make your mind and run to help your master.

This time, our goal was to make a game for GameBoy, you'll find a .gb version that you can play with an emulator or a web version which will be the equivalent of an online emulator

Controls for web version:  
A - Z  / Alt
B - X  / Ctrl
Select - Shift
